description:
## Objective 
Improve the color scheme of the app

## Description
In the setup passcode screen after logging in to the app and in the transfer method in the payments tab, change the color to match the color scheme with that of the entire application.
More details can be found on the following issue page  on GitHub:
https://github.com/openMF/mobile-wallet/issues/562

## How to get help
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or  ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos).
name: Mobile-wallet: Improve the color scheme of the app
